name: Yolo Space Hacker
description:
Join the Y0L0 Space Hacker Agency, an ethical hacker organisation.
Your first mission: hack into a space station and unravel its mystery.

What Happened On Bikini-72?

- Explore a 3d Adventure Game
- Solve puzzles based on real security breaches
- Crack passwords
- Intercept and temper with web requests
- Get passed servers security
- All of this in a secure environment to learn and improve your skills

Where to start?

> You know nothing about cybersecurity? That's fine, we're set to tell you everything you need to know!

We have prepared a comprehensive Cyber-security tutorial for beginners.

Complete missions, to learn step by step the various techniques used by hackers. You'll probably have to use your brain a little bit, but you'll never get stuck.

> You already know the basics of Linux machines and a bit of programming? That's great, it's going to get really interesting!

Real hacking tools

Use the hacker tools integrated into the game: a terminal, a web proxy, nmap to scan the network, dirb for brute-force attacks on websites, password lists to force authentication, John to crack passwords, reverse shells, privilege escalation techniques...

Once the flaw is found, run a Reverse Shell and get Admin.
